title: Rise of the Ronin Review (So Far) - PS I Love You XOXO Ep. 210
description:
This episode is sponsored by: 
Shady Rays
Robinhood

Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KF20 for $20 off each pair of polarized sunglasses.
Go to http://robinhood.com/boost to subscribe to Robinhood Gold and get a 3% match on every dollar you transfer in from another retirement account. Offer good through April 30th.

Greg, Andy, and Mike assemble to talk about what they've tackled in Team Ninja's latest! Our copies of Rise of the Ronin were provided by PlayStation for review purposes.
